title: Was / Were
description: Слушайте предложения с was/were и определяйте прошлое состояние.

tasks.audioText: I came home after work yesterday. I was very tired.

options.text: I felt exhausted after work.
I am tired right now.
I was full of energy.
I will be tired tomorrow.

tasks.explanation: 'Was tired' means the person felt exhausted in the past.

tasks.audioText: We had a meeting at nine. All the students were late.

options.text: The students are always on time.
The students arrived after the meeting started.
The students came early.
Only one student was late.

tasks.explanation: 'Were late' means they did not arrive on time.

tasks.audioText: The restaurant opened last month. The food was delicious.

options.text: The food tasted very bad.
The food is always good there.
The food tasted very good.
The restaurant had no food.

tasks.explanation: 'Was delicious' means the food tasted very good in the past.

tasks.audioText: I called Tom yesterday. He was at the hospital.

options.text: Tom is at the hospital now.
Tom was at home yesterday.
Tom was in the hospital when I called.
Tom will go to the hospital tomorrow.

tasks.explanation: 'Was at the hospital' means Tom was there at that moment in the past.

tasks.audioText: We went to the beach last weekend. The weather was beautiful.

options.text: The weather is nice today.
The weather was bad at the beach.
The weather was very nice last weekend.
It rained at the beach.

tasks.explanation: 'Was beautiful' means the weather was very nice in the past.

tasks.audioText: My parents visited us last night. They were happy to see the children.
tasks.transcript: They were happy to see the children.

options.text: My parents felt glad when they saw the kids.
My parents were sad to visit.
The children were not at home.
My parents did not come.

tasks.explanation: 'Were happy' means they felt glad at that time.

tasks.audioText: I checked the fridge this morning. There was no milk left.

options.text: There is a lot of milk now.
The fridge had no milk this morning.
I bought milk this morning.
The milk was fresh.

tasks.explanation: 'There was no milk' means the fridge was empty of milk at that moment.

tasks.audioText: We arrived at the cinema at eight. The movie was already over.

options.text: The movie had finished before we arrived.
The movie was just starting.
We watched the whole movie.
The movie is playing right now.

tasks.explanation: 'Was already over' means the movie ended before they got there.

tasks.audioText: I met Sarah at the party. She was in a beautiful blue dress.
tasks.transcript: She was in a beautiful blue dress.

options.text: Sarah always wears blue dresses.
Sarah is wearing a blue dress now.
Sarah wore a nice blue dress at the party.
Sarah did not go to the party.

tasks.explanation: 'Was in a dress' means she wore that dress at the party.

tasks.audioText: The kids played outside all afternoon. They were very hungry after that.
tasks.transcript: They were very hungry after that.

options.text: The kids are hungry right now.
The kids wanted to eat after playing.
The kids were not hungry.
The kids ate lunch before playing.

tasks.explanation: 'Were very hungry' means they wanted food after playing.

tasks.audioText: I visited the new office yesterday. It was really big and modern.
tasks.transcript: It was really big and modern.

options.text: The office is small and old.
The office was large and new-looking.
The office will be big in the future.
I did not see the office.

tasks.explanation: 'Was really big and modern' describes the office in the past.

tasks.audioText: We had a test on Monday. The questions were very difficult.

options.text: The test questions were easy.
The questions on the test were hard.
There were no questions on the test.
The test is tomorrow.

tasks.explanation: 'Were very difficult' means the questions were hard.

tasks.audioText: I tried to call the shop at six. It was already closed.

options.text: The shop is open right now.
The shop was still open at six.
The shop had closed before six o'clock.
I went shopping at six.

tasks.explanation: 'Was already closed' means the shop closed before the person called.

tasks.audioText: My sister flew to London last week. The flight was three hours long.
tasks.transcript: The flight was three hours long.

options.text: The flight took three hours.
The flight took five hours.
My sister drove to London.
The flight is tomorrow.

tasks.explanation: 'Was three hours long' means the flight lasted three hours.

tasks.audioText: We went camping last summer. The nights were cold in the mountains.
tasks.transcript: The nights were cold in the mountains.

options.text: The nights are always warm there.
It was warm at night in the mountains.
The temperature at night was low in the mountains.
They did not go to the mountains.

tasks.explanation: 'Were cold' means the temperature was low at night.

short_description: Was / Were: прошлые состояния и описания
